basic.description: This course content is comprised of practicum experiences in school, community, or clinical settings. These work experiences are supervised by on-site personnel (i.e. art therapists, special educators, psychologists, counselors) and by university faculty with ATR-BC credentials. Supervision, equivalent to ten hours for every one hundred hours of field work, is integral to this practicum.
basic.subject: ARE
basic.title: Practicum III
